byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The deal will give Cigna a significant new presence in Medicare and senior care coverage, an area that is expected to continue growing rapidly.
snippet: The deal will give Cigna a significant new presence in Medicare and senior care coverage, an area that is expected to continue growing rapidly.

headline.main: Cigna to Buy HealthSpring for $3.8 Billion
headline.print_headline: Cigna Makes Deal to Buy HealthSpring
